48.eng-name: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: {M-49} Bize bu hadîsi Ebû Kureyb de rivayet etti. (Dedikî): Bize Ebû Muaviye ile Veki', Hişam'dnn bu isnadla rivayet ettiler

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّعَوُّذِ مِنْ شَرِّ الْفِتَنِ وَغَيْرِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Supplications And Seeking Refuge With Allah
